column2: Current social proection coverage of the extreme poor in Least Developed Countries is at most 20%
DI estimated leakage rates applied to World Bank figures for total beneficiaries (The State of Social Safety Nets 2014).
% of estimated coverage of extremely poor people (undr $1.25 a day at 2005 PPPs) by the five largest social safety net programmes. Countries ordered by poverty gap: largest on left
